name: How Figma designers jam it out
description:
Since launching earlier this year, FigJam has helped our team open up our design process across the company and create an even more collaborative culture at Figma. To learn more from our recent livestream discussion with the product team, read this blog post or check out the YouTube video.


Before we start brainstorming with product managers and engineers, we may set up a FigJam file with some of these components. We do this to add constraints to the activity. That way, everyone can quickly jot down ideas without getting distracted or spending too much time on a single idea. 


Feel free to mix and match these components depending on your goals or the type of group activity.
